name: HellTh-(Jam Version)
description:
A bullet hell where you play a cowboy samurai on his way to hell.

Controls
WASD - obvi
LMB - Shoot
RMB - Dash (cool down of 2 seconds)

Bottom left: Health&Ammo, Bottom right: Dash available

Each bullet shown on screen represents a bullet you can shoot. However your ammo and health are tied together. When you are out of ammo you have one last chance to survive. If you get hit you die. Starting w/ six bullets you run out fairly quickly whether that's shooting enemies or getting hit, so for every enemy you kill with the dash ability you get one ammo.

The end of the line pointing to your cursor represents the distance you can dash. Also if you don't hear the audio queue for when the dash ability is off cool down the icon in the bottom right represents when dash is available.

Finally there are 5 waves of enemies. The next wave will start when all of the enemies from the previous wave are dead followed by an audio queue of 2 drum taps. You will not be able to survive more than 30 seconds after wave 5.
